Text: FW Super BowlPST Chris Boulanger and a bunch of my buddies will be doing this for the Super Bowl see below You should check it out Craig Gents With the void created by Pearsons absence I think I have found a Super Bowl party worthy of our attendance The Deal Cowboys Sunday February rd Topless Waitresses and a half time lesbian show I assure I am not making this up Tickets are Seeing as this invite came to me by way of a friend of friend I would appreciate if it was all kept on the hush hush and please dont pass this along to anyone else You were all chosen for a reason As you can imagine tickets are selling fast so let me know tomorrow at the latest and I will arrange to get you a ticket Kindest Regards Warren Moon
